Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility

Class DelayUtility

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.cell.utility.DelayUtility
  • public final class DelayUtility
extends Object
    Cellular delay utility to calculate the delay from within cell. (Relies on the logic of the MOSAIC-communication Delay model)

    • Method Detail

      • calculateDelay

        public static long calculateDelay​(CNetworkProperties region,
                                  TransmissionMode mode,
                                  String nodeId,
                                  RandomNumberGenerator rng)
                           throws InternalFederateException
        Calculates the core delay for the given region.
        Parameters:
        region - Region to calculate the delay for
        mode - The transmission mode either Uplink (ie Veh,Rsu -> GEO) or Downlink (in unicast as well as multicast (ie GEO -> Veh,Rsu).
        nodeId - Id of a single node for the GammaSpeedDelay (only possible in Unicast, otherwise can be null)
        rng - RandomNumberGenerator to be used for delay calculation
        Returns:
        calculatedDelay [unit: ns]
        Throws:
        InternalFederateException - if delay type couldn't be determined, or invalid combination of Delay and TransmissionMode was used
